name: consenhub-backend
description: TM Forum-compliant Consent Management System for SLT Mobitel

scripts.install:all: cd backend/shared && npm install && cd ../consent-service && npm install && cd ../preference-service && npm install && cd ../privacy-notice-service && npm install && cd ../agreement-service && npm install && cd ../event-service && npm install && cd ../party-service && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install && cd ../dsar-service && npm install && cd ../api-gateway && npm install
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:consent" "npm run start:preference" "npm run start:privacy-notice" "npm run start:agreement" "npm run start:event" "npm run start:party" "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:dsar"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:consent" "npm run dev:preference" "npm run dev:privacy-notice" "npm run dev:agreement" "npm run dev:event" "npm run dev:party" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:dsar"
scripts.test: echo "Running all service tests..." && cd backend/consent-service && npm test && cd ../preference-service && npm test && cd ../privacy-notice-service && npm test && cd ../agreement-service && npm test && cd ../event-service && npm test && cd ../party-service && npm test && cd ../auth-service && npm test && cd ../dsar-service && npm test
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run docker:build

author: SLT Mobitel
